General.Name: Mangels Industrial S.A
General.Description: Mangels Industrial S.A. primarily produces and sells aluminum wheels for the automotive industry in Brazil and internationally. It also offers liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) containers and fuel air tanks for buses and trucks. In addition it manufactures LPG cylinder; rear axles for light vehicles; air vessels for heavy vehicles; agricultural machinary; and air compressors. The company was formerly known as Mangels & Kreutzberg Ltda. and changed its name to Mangels Industrial S.A. in 1963. Mangels Industrial S.A. was founded in 1928 and is headquartered in Campos Gerais, Brazil.
General.Address: Rodovia FernAo Dias, Km 755.6, Campos Gerais, MG, Brazil, 37410-760
